text: is a stratovolcano located west of Mount Bandai, close to Bandai town and Kitashiobara village in the Fukushima Prefecture, Japan. It is 1,403.6 metres high, and close to Lake Inawashiro and Oguni-numa Pond. Bandai volcano (right) Nekoma volcano from the SW. == External links == * Nekomagatake - Geological Survey of Japan Nekomadake Nekomadake Category:Volcanoes of Fukushima Prefecture Category:Shugendō
title: Mount Nekomadake
